--- Created by liuyubao.
--- DateTime: 2021/12/20 15:02
---@class ProcessUtil
ProcessUtil = {}


function ProcessUtil:creatTree()

end
---@return ProcessTree
function ProcessUtil:creatMainBattleProcessTree(data)
    local tempTree = MainBattleProcessTree:new(data)
    local index = 0
    for i, v in ipairs(tempTree._blackBoard._battleData.battleList) do
        index = index + 1
        tempTree:addNode(SetUpTeamNode:new(tempTree,index,v))
        index = index + 1
        tempTree:addNode(BattleMainNode:new(tempTree,index,tempTree._blackBoard._battleData))
    end
    return tempTree
end

return ProcessUtil
